record.title: H-PRIZE ACT OF 2007
record.chair: The unfinished business is the vote on the motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, H.R. 632, as amended, on which the yeas and nays were ordered.
record.narrative: The Clerk read the title of the bill.
record.chair: The question is on the motion offered by the gentleman from Illinois (Mr. Lipinski) that the House suspend the rules and pass the bill, H.R. 632, as amended.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, on rollcall No. 433, I was meeting with constituents in the Rayburn Room. Had I been present, I would have voted "yea."
